00017 #ifndef __STANN_RAND__
00018 #define __STANN_RAND__
00019 
00027 #include <cstdlib>
00028 
00029 static double __drand48__() 
00030 {
00031   /* We don't have drand48.  Use rand() to get the bits.  We call
00032      rand() three times since RAND_MAX it at least 16 bits. */
00033   double f = 1.0 / (RAND_MAX + 1.0);
00034   double x = std::rand();
00035   x = x * f + std::rand();
00036   x = x * f + std::rand();
00037   return x * f;
00038 }
00039 
00040 static void  __srand48__(unsigned int seedval) 
00041 {
00042   std::srand(seedval);
00043   return;
00044 }
00045   
00046 
00047 #endif
